original_text: The shepherds with their flocks shall come unto her; they shall pitch their tents against her round about; they shall feed every one in his place.
korean_text: 목자들이 그 양 떼를 몰고 와서 주위에 자기 장막을 치고 각기 그 처소에서 먹이리로다

sentences.original_text: The shepherds with their flocks shall come unto her
sentences.korean_translation: 양 떼를 거느린 목자들이 그녀에게로 올 것이다

sentences.original_text: they shall pitch their tents against her round about
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그녀 주변에 천막을 칠 것이다

sentences.original_text: they shall feed every one in his place
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 각자 자기의 위치에서 먹일 것이다
